version_description: The iBOOD app is in constant state of development and is getting updated regularly in order to optimize the user experience.
The iBOOD app is in constant state of development and is getting updated regularly in order to optimize the user experience.
The iBOOD app is in constant state of development and is getting updated regularly in order to optimize the user experience.
The iBOOD app is in constant state of development and is getting updated regularly in order to optimize the user experience.
The iBOOD app is in constant state of development and is getting updated regularly in order to optimize the user experience.

“Thanks to your help and feedback we constantly improve the app experience.”

Below you will find our latest improvements:
• The enlarge images on the product detail page are swipable for easy scrolling
• “Remind me” functionality extent to 10 hours.
• After reset “remind me” you will receive a confirmation via pop up banner
• During slow connection we make it possible to browse through the app while the images are still loading
• Now you can copy the product title for easy comparison

Note: the following update you can copy the entire text at specifications and descriptions

With your help and feedback, we are constantly working to improve our app:

These are our latest improvements:
- Browse deals without logging in. At the login screen, select 'Skip Login' and log in only when you want to order.
- One click payment. Save your payment method and pay quickly and easily with one click.
- Every Thursday an ”app only deal” especially selected for our app users
- Various bug fixes (among others to solve the problem with automatic logout)

With your help and feedback, we are constantly working to improve our app:

These are our latest improvements:
- Forum name no longer required
- “Skip” button made bigger to easily skip the log in.
- Bug problem solved where Belgian users see English texts
- Small bugs fixes

Logging in:
Easier and faster login with fingerprint and we added a ‘remind me’ checkbox.

Performance:
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Based on your feedback, we are constantly improving the iBOOD app. In the past weeks we have introduced the following improvements:

The app now has an introduction page with menu, inbox, notifications, feedback feature and the ability to contact our customer service;
It is now possible to view all day deals without opening the iBOOD app. Install this 'widget' in the Notification Center; The 'user flow' has been improved so it's easier to use the app.
Bugfixes
Bugfixes
We are continuously working on improving our app! Once again we have done a number of bug fixes with which the usability has been optimized.
Bugfixes
Bugfixes

We update the iBOOD app as often as possible to improve the performance and the user experience.

In the version we add the following:
- New travel category to get the best travel deals you can find
- Bug fixes.

Like our app? Rate us and give your feedback.
